verses.roman:
govardhana-śilā prabhu hṛdaye-netre dhare
kabhu nāsāya ghrāṇa laya, kabhu śire kare

synonyms: govardhana-śilā—the stone from Govardhana Hill; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; hṛdaye—on the heart; netre—on the eyes; dhare—puts; kabhu—sometimes; nāsāya—with the nose; ghrāṇa laya—smells; kabhu—sometimes; śire kare—He puts on His head.
translation: The Lord would put the stone to His heart or sometimes to His eyes. Sometimes He would smell it with His nose and sometimes place it on His head.
